name: netyark-mall-aims
description: Netyark Mall Admin & Inventory Management System

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build

author: Netyark Mall
